titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Julie Kathryn Franco (I Am Snow Angel) Papers MSS.480
titlestmt.author: Bess Pittman

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-11-30 10:53:04 -0500.

change.item: edited by Nicole Greenhouse to reflect additional administrative information and added archived websites.

did.unittitle: Julie Kathryn Franco I Am Snow Angel Papers

physdesc.extent: in 65 computer files and 1 archived website.

did.abstract: The Julie Kathryn Franco I am Snow Angel Papers is composed of the works of music artist Julie Kathryn Franco between 2014-2016 under her performance alias I Am Snow Angel, which she uses to produce electronica music. The collection includes sound recordings from 5 EPs, 1 full-length album, 6 singles and 5 music videos, all written and performed by I Am Snow Angel. It also includes the website iamsnowangel.com, which includes a brief biography of the artist, performance videos, audio recordings, and articles featuring Julie Kathryn Franco and her work as I Am Snow Angel.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Julie Kathryn Franco I Am Snow Angel Papers documents the work of female music artist Julie Kathryn Franco under her performance alias I Am Snow Angel between 2014-2016. The collection contains 41 sound recordings and 5 video recordings made by Franco; an archived copy of iamsnowangel.com, the website owned and operated by Franco; 18 image files of album art; and one spreadsheet created by Franco with information about each recording. The website includes a brief biography of the artist, performance videos, audio recordings, and articles featuring Franco and her work as I Am Snow Angel. The image files are digital copies of the artwork included with her albums, the creator(s) of which are unknown. These files are arranged with the sound recordings for the relevant albums. The spreadsheet includes information about the recordings, including format, title, and release information.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged according to the format of the material, then alphabetically by title.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Julie Kathryn Franco is a female music artist who grew up in Lake Placid, New York and currently lives in New York City. She was a social worker for several years before she began recording her music. She was raised performing music, and has experimented with several styles in her recording career. She put out her first Americana Noir EP, "Broken Love", in 2012 under the name Julie Kathryn, followed by her first full-length album, "Black Trees", in 2013. In 2014, she embarked on a new musical project under the name I Am Snow Angel to explore self-produced electronica.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The Fales Library & Special Collections is not the copyright owner for this collection. Collection use is subject to all copyright laws. Researchers wishing to reproduce collection material should contact rights holders for permission.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by Julie Kathryn Franco, September 2016. The accession number associated with this gift is 2017.021.

https://www.iamsnowangel.com/ was initially added as part of the New York University Collection of Contemporary Composers' Websites Web Archive in 2017 through the use of Archive-it. Archive-It uses web crawling technology to capture websites at a scheduled time and displays only an archived copy, from the resulting WARC file, of the website. In 2018, the crawling was discontinued and began being captured in the Avery Fisher Center: Julie Kathryn Web Archive. In January 2020, http://soundcloud.com/iamsnowangel/ was added to the web archives. The accession number associated with this website is 2020.013. In February 2020, https://www.youtube.com/user/heyiamsnowangel/videos and https://www.instagram.com/i_am_snowangel/ were added to the web archives. The accession number associated with these websites are 2020.025.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: For electronic records: Identification of item, date; Julie Kathryn Franco I Am Snow Angel Papers; MSS 480; electronic record identifier; Fales Library & Special Collections, New York University.

For archived website: "Page Title." Archived month/day/year. Julie Kathryn Franco (I Am Snow Angel) Collection, Fales Library & Special Collections, New York University. https://wayback.archive-it.org/4049/*/http://www.iamsnowangel.com. (Accessed month/day/year)

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
phystech.p: Advance notice is required for the use of computer records. Original physical digital media is restricted.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The collection was forensically imaged and mounted to local storage.
New York University Libraries follows professional standards and best practices when imaging, ingesting, and processing born-digital material in order to maintain the integrity of the content.
In 2020, additional archived websites were added to the finding aid.

appraisal.head: Take-down Policy
appraisal.p: Archived websites are made accessible for purposes of education and research. NYU Libraries have given attribution to rights holders when possible; however, due to the nature of archival collections, we are not always able to identify this information. If you hold the rights to materials in our archived websites that are unattributed, please let us know so that we may maintain accurate information about these materials. If you are a rights holder and are concerned that you have found material on this website for which you have not granted permission (or is not covered by a copyright exception under US copyright laws), you may request the removal of the material from our site by submitting a notice, with the elements described below, to fales.library@nyu.edu. Please include the following in your notice: Identification of the material that you believe to be infringing and information sufficient to permit us to locate the material; your contact information, such as an address, telephone number, and email address; a statement that you are the owner, or authorized to act on behalf of the owner, of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed and that you have a good-faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law; a statement that the information in the notification is accurate and made under penalty of perjury; and your physical or electronic signature. Upon receiving a notice that includes the details listed above, we will remove the allegedly infringing material from public view while we assess the issues identified in your notice.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Sound and video recordings are available for streaming with password authentification from NYU Libraries for researchers with prior approval from the NYU Libraries based on a 2016 agreement with the donor.

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
phystech.p: Due to technical or privacy issues, archived websites may not be exact copies of the original website at the time of the web crawl. Certain file types will not be captured dependent on how they are embedded in the site. Other parts of websites that the crawler has difficulty capturing includes Javascript, streaming content, database-driven content, and highly interactive content. Full-Text searches of archived websites are available at https://archive-it.org/organizations/567.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: New site crawls are accrued quarterly.

appraisal.head: Appraisal
appraisal.p: Crawl was limited to domains and subdomains of iamsnowangel.com in order to remain within the collection scope and data constraints.
Robots.txt (a piece of code designed to limit crawler activity within a website) was ignored on Instagram, Soundcloud, and Youtube profiles.
Embedded Soundcloud audio were captured, but do not render in the archived copy. Future changes to the Wayback Machine may allow the files to be played.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The I Am Snow Angel website contains information about Julie Kathryn's work as a recording artist, including videos, audio, and images of her work and performances. It also includes tour dates and news about music releases and press information. The main website embeds properties from her Soundcloud, Youtube, and Instagram pages, which are also a part of the capture of her web presence.
